creator: ebalazs@mozilla.com
summary: Perma failure html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html when Gecko 62 merges to Beta on 14-06-2018

comments.text:
[Tracking Requested - why for this release]:
Central as Beta: https://treeherder.mozilla.org/#/jobs?repo=try&revision=405da34b2d8ed2c19df5abaa0caaf0dd26ce6dff&filter-resultStatus=testfailed&filter-resultStatus=busted&filter-resultStatus=exception&filter-resultStatus=usercancel&filter-resultStatus=runnable&selectedJob=182822526

Failure log: https://treeherder.mozilla.org/logviewer.html#?job_id=182822526&repo=try&lineNumber=19780

13:20:36     INFO - TEST-PASS | /html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html | A form control has multiple labels. 
13:20:36     INFO - TEST-PASS | /html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html | A labelable element is moved to outside of nested associated labels. 
13:20:36     INFO - TEST-PASS | /html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html | A labelable element is moved to inside of nested associated labels. 
13:20:36     INFO - TEST-PASS | /html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html | A labelable element which is a descendant of non-labelable element is moved to outside of associated label. 
13:20:36     INFO - TEST-PASS | /html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html | A labelable element is moved to iframe. 
13:20:36     INFO - TEST-PASS | /html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html | A div element which contains labelable element is removed. 
13:20:36     INFO - TEST-PASS | /html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html | A labelable element not in a document can label element in the same tree. 
13:20:36     INFO - TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | /html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html | A labelable element inside the shadow DOM. - document.getElementById(...).attachShadow is not a function
13:20:36     INFO - @http://web-platform.test:8000/html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html:282:15
13:20:36     INFO - Test.prototype.step@http://web-platform.test:8000/resources/testharness.js:1538:20
13:20:36     INFO - test@http://web-platform.test:8000/resources/testharness.js:548:9
13:20:36     INFO - @http://web-platform.test:8000/html/semantics/forms/the-label-element/label-attributes.sub.html:273:3

This is a regression from bug 1467143: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1467143
comments.author: ebalazs@mozilla.com

comments.text: Needs to enable the shadow dom pref.
comments.author: emilio@crisal.io

comments.text:

comments.text:
131 failures in 408 pushes (0.321 failures/push) were associated with this bug in the last 7 days. 

This is the #4 most frequent failure this week. 

** This failure happened more than 75 times this week! Resolving this bug is a very high priority. **

** Try to resolve this bug as soon as possible. If unresolved for 1 week, the affected test(s) may be disabled. **
